String.string: The {@creature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers} have the samples we need.
I'm sure the {@creature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers} put up a struggle, but I'm glad you prevailed.
Get argon brainwashing samples from {@creature:46#203#argonomorph Lokian slayers} in {@Rgn:46004$$Raga Kabash}.
Return to the {@Rgn:46015$$Hexheart Chamber} and deliver the argon brainwashing samples to {@creature:246#1026$$Beranie}.
Take the nearby elevator down and deliver the argon brainwashing samples to {@creature:246#1102$$Nevian} in the {@Rgn:46016$$Mindcrown Chamber}.
